A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really loved this movie\, i saw it twice in 5 days. I loved the way the characters develop. I loved the acting. Visually it was stunning! It was made wich so much love for the original trilogy\, you can see the director was a fan in his childhood. The only thing i really didn't like is the ending of Snoke\, but I hope Kylo Ren will develop further in the dark side and become an even stronger bad guy! This movie takes the Star Wars saga in a new direction and clears the path for a new generation!
